phases.immediate: Fix infrastructure issues preventing test execution
phases.shortTerm: Implement critical security and payment module tests
phases.mediumTerm: Expand coverage for core business logic and APIs
phases.longTerm: Complete UI testing and performance validation

parallelization.approach: Divide by module type (security, business logic, UI)

recommendations.title: Fix Test Infrastructure Issues
recommendations.description: Address failing tests and infrastructure problems before adding new coverage
actions: Fix CORS/JSDOM configuration for cross-origin requests

recommendations.title: Prioritize Security Module Testing
recommendations.description: Achieve 100% coverage for authentication, authorization, and payment processing

recommendations.title: Implement Test Automation Strategy
recommendations.description: Set up automated testing and coverage monitoring

recommendations.title: Systematic Coverage Improvement
recommendations.description: Address coverage gaps in prioritized order
actions: Focus on P0 modules first (security, payments)

automationOpportunities.description: Auto-generate test skeletons for new modules
Automated analysis of coverage trends and regressions
Automated test data generation for consistent testing
Automated tracking of performance metrics in tests
